title: I don't have to mia or leave my lane its not in the TOS. I wont get banned because im enjoying the g
body:
" i don't mia or help because I don't have to, map awareness op" - Our azir last game. Didnt group till last second then complained that his team was toxic towards him.

Said it didn't matter because he was enjoying the game.

Tried to report our whole team while everyone reported him.

Where do these people come from?
